divs: Sighting DetailsThe movie I was watching was just ending when I looked out my front windows thatface west to the California side of Lake Havasu. The red spot was heading westand made a 90 degree turn to the north and when I saw that is when I went in andgot my binoculars and focused in on what appeared to be red cone with the pointon the top with a orangish red cloud like below it. My son saw the red dot butdidnt get to see it through the binoculars as it went low to the western horizonheading north towards Bullhead City Az or Las Vegas NV.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Havasu City
This sighting has never been favorited.
